name: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
description: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Sweeps the caster up into a cyclone, applying a basic dispel, fully disabling them and turning them invulnerable for a short while.
notes: Applies a basic dispel and Cyclone effect on the target upon cast, turning it invulnerable and fully disabled
The Cyclone duration is not affected by status resistance
Cyclone first applies the dispel, then the cyclone modifier
Can only target enemies, self or own Meepo Clones and Tempest Doubles
Cannot target other allies, wards or buildings
While cycloned, the affected unit is moved upwards and has no collision
A 24-radius pathing blocker is created at the base of the affected unit while active
The magical spell damage is applied at the end of the duration
If the cyclone gets dispelled, it still applies the damage as soon as the target lands
The damage is only applied to enemy targets
Cannot lift up Roshan, instead, it instantly applies the damage

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
If a Wind Waker was purchased as well, Wind Waker's icon takes priority
The item's attributes grant additional mana, mana regeneration and magic resistance
Provides main attack damage to intelligence and universal heroes
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses
Purges first, then applies Cyclone modifier
